item.title: A Visual History of Kate Upton
item.description:
A Visual History of Kate Upton

From bagging magazine covers to fronting ad campaigns, Kate Upton is probably one of the most recognizable models around. With perfect cheeks that no doubt helped in launching her lingerie and swim line, the star is a bombshell we never tire of seeing.

item.title: Exclusive: Emily Ratajkowski on John Updike, Acting and Getting Naked
item.description:
Exclusive: Emily Ratajkowski on John Updike, Acting and Getting Naked

Let's just stipulate from the outset: Emily Ratajkowski is a very attractive woman. From a purely visual standpoint, she's got it going on. That said, it's not just her looks that make us love her. We're not that shallow. Looks are pedestrian. They're earthbound. They're just looks. Get over it!

item.title: These Never-Before-Seen Apollo Mission Photos Will Blow Your Mind | Maxim
item.description:
These Never-Before-Seen Apollo Mission Photos Will Blow Your Mind | Maxim

If you love space as much as we do, rejoice: On Monday, NASA released a huge cache of photographs from the Apollo lunar missions - including the historic Apollo 11 moon landing - flown by NASA between 1961 and 1975. The release is a trove of never-before-scene photos from the heyday of America's space program.

item.title: Will This Floating Wearable Keep You From Dying In A Watery Grave?
item.description:
Will This Floating Wearable Keep You From Dying In A Watery Grave?

The most recent survival gadget to hit the crowd-funding market is essentially a life jacket you wear on your wrist. They're calling it Kingii, and at the very least, it may be the answer to awkward life-vest tan lines.

item.title: The Ten Sexiest Cars You Can Buy Right Now
item.description:
The Ten Sexiest Cars You Can Buy Right Now

Automobile taxonomy is a mess. For one, brands are dropping model names faster than Aziz Ansari. Cadillac once sold Eldorados, Fleetwoods, and Coupe Devilles; it now offers CTSs, ATSs, and SRXs (the Escalade is the only Cadillac to get name-checked regularly in hip-hop, which may or may not be the reason it's still called an Escalade).

item.title: "Tinder For Threesomes" Gets a Mysterious $500,000 Investment
item.description:
"Tinder For Threesomes" Gets a Mysterious $500,000 Investment

Let's just cut the bullshit. We all want to be having more threesomes. Whether FMF or MMF is your thing (no judgments here), a mÃ©nage a trois shouldn't just be something you try once. But despite the increasingly lax attitudes of young Americans, it is still pretty damn hard, and awkward, to initiate one.
